== What is PC Jacking? ==
"PC Jacking" is a term used by Manu Cornet, and is as he describes it "sticking Linux Live CDs in computers located in popular department stores, to let the customers know that something other than Windows exists".

== Explanatory Phrases ==
''"This is a Linux CD to protest against the forced sale of Microsoft Windows with every computer bought in this store. This CD leaves the computer totally unaffected. Just take the CD out of the drive and reboot to let the computer back in its original state."'' (Manu's)
